desc_content.paragraph: Add vertex to feather

field_body.paragraph: location (float array of 2 items in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Location, Location of vertex in normalized space

desc_content.paragraph: Add new vertex to feather and slide it

list_item.paragraph: MASK_OT_add_feather_vertex (MASK_OT_add_feather_vertex, (optional)) – Add Feather Vertex, Add vertex to feather
MASK_OT_slide_point (MASK_OT_slide_point, (optional)) – Slide Point, Slide control points

desc_content.paragraph: Add vertex to active spline

field_body.paragraph: location (float array of 2 items in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Location, Location of vertex in normalized space

desc_content.paragraph: Add new vertex and slide it

list_item.paragraph: MASK_OT_add_vertex (MASK_OT_add_vertex, (optional)) – Add Vertex, Add vertex to active spline
MASK_OT_slide_point (MASK_OT_slide_point, (optional)) – Slide Point, Slide control points

desc_content.paragraph: Copy selected splines to clipboard
Toggle cyclic for selected splines
Delete selected control points or splines
Duplicate selected control points and segments between them
Duplicate mask and move

list_item.paragraph: MASK_OT_duplicate (MASK_OT_duplicate, (optional)) – Duplicate Mask, Duplicate selected control points and segments between them
TRANSFORM_OT_translate (TRANSFORM_OT_translate, (optional)) – Move, Move selected items

desc_content.paragraph: Reset the feather weight to zero
Set type of handles for selected control points
Reveal the layer by setting the hide flag
Hide the layer by setting the hide flag

field_body.paragraph: unselected (boolean, (optional)) – Unselected, Hide unselected rather than selected layers

desc_content.paragraph: Move the active layer up/down in the list

field_body.paragraph: direction (enum in ['UP', 'DOWN'], (optional)) – Direction, Direction to move the active layer

desc_content.paragraph: Add new mask layer for masking

field_body.paragraph: name (string, (optional, never None)) – Name, Name of new mask layer

desc_content.paragraph: Remove mask layer
Create new mask

field_body.paragraph: name (string, (optional, never None)) – Name, Name of new mask

desc_content.paragraph: Re-calculate the direction of selected handles
Clear the mask’s parenting
Set the mask’s parenting
Paste splines from clipboard
Add new circle-shaped spline

list_item.paragraph: size (float in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Size, Size of new circle
location (float array of 2 items in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Location, Location of new circle

desc_content.paragraph: Add new square-shaped spline

list_item.paragraph: size (float in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Size, Size of new circle
location (float array of 2 items in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Location, Location of new circle

desc_content.paragraph: Select spline points

list_item.paragraph: extend (boolean, (optional)) – Extend, Extend selection instead of deselecting everything first
deselect (boolean, (optional)) – Deselect, Remove from selection
toggle (boolean, (optional)) – Toggle Selection, Toggle the selection
location (float array of 2 items in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Location, Location of vertex in normalized space

desc_content.paragraph: Change selection of all curve points

field_body.paragraph: action (enum in ['TOGGLE', 'SELECT', 'DESELECT', 'INVERT'], (optional)) – Action, Selection action to executeTOGGLE Toggle, Toggle selection for all elements.SELECT Select, Select all elements.DESELECT Deselect, Deselect all elements.INVERT Invert, Invert selection of all elements.

desc_content.paragraph: Select curve points using box selection

list_item.paragraph: xmin (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – X Min
xmax (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – X Max
ymin (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Y Min
ymax (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Y Max
deselect (boolean, (optional)) – Deselect, Deselect rather than select items
extend (boolean, (optional)) – Extend, Extend selection instead of deselecting everything first

desc_content.paragraph: Select curve points using circle selection

list_item.paragraph: x (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – X
y (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Y
radius (int in [1, inf], (optional)) – Radius
deselect (boolean, (optional)) – Deselect, Deselect rather than select items

desc_content.paragraph: Select curve points using lasso selection

list_item.paragraph: path (bpy_prop_collection of OperatorMousePath, (optional)) – Path
deselect (boolean, (optional)) – Deselect, Deselect rather than select items
extend (boolean, (optional)) – Extend, Extend selection instead of deselecting everything first

desc_content.paragraph: Deselect spline points at the boundary of each selection region
Select all curve points linked to already selected ones
(De)select all points linked to the curve under the mouse cursor
Select more spline points connected to initial selection
Undocumented contribute <https://developer.blender.org/T51061>
Reset feather weights on all selected points animation values
Undocumented contribute <https://developer.blender.org/T51061>
Recalculate animation data on selected points for frames selected in the dopesheet

list_item.paragraph: location (boolean, (optional)) – Location
feather (boolean, (optional)) – Feather

desc_content.paragraph: Slide control points

list_item.paragraph: slide_feather (boolean, (optional)) – Slide Feather, First try to slide feather instead of vertex
is_new_point (boolean, (optional)) – Slide New Point, Newly created vertex is being slid

desc_content.paragraph: Slide a point on the spline to define it’s curvature
Switch direction of selected splines
